document_data.mainbody:
The Copper Tap was a tavern in Calimshan, famed for its award-winning brews in the late 15 century DR.
The Copper Tap was a locally popular establishment that brewed its own type of award-winning ale.
In the , sailor PJ Stubbs, a friend of Bosun Gannet of the Blushing Mermaid in Baldurs Gate, found himself in Calimshan and decided to visit The Copper Tap. The discussion he quickly regretted, claiming that its award-winning brew tasted like "flowers had a wank on his tongue." PJ hated the taste so much that the sailor complained about it in a letter sent to Bosun Gannet. Even ten pints of ale failed to wash the taste off.
